Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by Columbus in 1977...
Injured on 8/23/1978 with a Sprained Ankle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1983, off Bill Cook (BC)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/9/1983, off Mike Davis (BC)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1984, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1985, hitting .421 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Bay City on 7/14/1986...
Hit 3 homeruns against Northeastern, driving in 3 runs on 7/22/1986...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against New Jersey on 8/27/1986...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Bay City on 9/13/1986...
Drove in 6 runs against Northeastern on 10/10/1986...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Pittsburgh on 10/21/1986...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1989, hitting .522 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1991, hitting .550 with 1 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 4/20/1992 with a Pulled Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
